title: Take your PC’s performance to new heights with Windows 11 Pro, now just $29.97
content:
Macworld

Are you a Mac lover who secretly also loves their PC just as much as their Apple gear? Then you need Microsoft’s latest operating system, Windows 11 Pro. Now, for a limited time, lifetime access is only $29.97.

For any rig meeting system requirements and ready for a new OS, Windows 11 Pro package offers not only an activation key that can be used on up to 3 devices, but also business-focused and highly advanced security features.

With Windows 11 Pro’s BitLocker encryption, your data is shielded from any unauthorized access if your device is lost or stolen. Meanwhile, Windows Hello features full biometric authentication, while Windows Information Protection allows users to separate all their personal and work data, even allowing business app restrictions so they’re only accessible for use with business data. 

There are also many productivity-focused features, like improved voice typing, custom window layouts, and more. Just be sure to check the specs of your current machine to make sure you can download this OS.

Grab Windows 11 Pro for just $29.97 for a limited time — no coupon necessary.
